name: 6 Feet Apart
description:
6 Feet Apart is a game I developed while cooped up at home during the global pandemic.  I wanted a change of pace from my day job, and chose a design that a person can quickly do by themselves.  

Your goal in the game is to pick up lunch while avoiding other shoppers who may be getting a little bit too close.  Stay away to keep down your sickness meter, and go for a high score.

You control the main character with the arrow keys.

Music: « Dance » from Bensound.com

Music: « House » from Bensound.com
